title: Revises provisions relating to energy storage systems. (BDR 58-60)

other_titles.title: AN ACT relating to energy; revising a definition relating to certain renewable energy facilities; revising provisions governing the establishment by the Public Utilities Commission of Nevada of biennial targets for the procurement of energy storage systems by certain electric utilities; requiring the Commission to reevaluate the existing biennial targets; eliminating an obsolete provision relating to the establishment of such targets; establishing requirements for the installation of electrochemical energy storage systems; and providing other matters properly relating thereto.

actions.description: Returned from Secretary of State.Made Special Order of Business for Tuesday, February 11, 2025, at 11:15 a.m..
